content:
What It Took to Build This

  • Customer service

    • Fallacy is automating reduces customer contact with human support
    • Problem is dealing with transfers based on authentication problems

  • Records

    • Registrant Name Change Agreements in a month - 8,792
    • Phone calls answered in a day - 4,800

  • 1.8 Million pieces of email sent a month to hostmaster

  • Staffing - 300 people
